defs: The manner in which the light strikes upon a picture; that partof a picture which represents those objects upon which the light issupposed to fall; the more illuminated part of a landscape or otherscene; -- opposed to shade. Cf. Chiaroscuro.

The manner in which the light strikes upon a picture; that partof a picture which represents those objects upon which the light issupposed to fall; the more illuminated part of a landscape or otherscene; -- opposed to shade. Cf. Chiaroscuro.
